name: Rainbow Blob
description:
The Game Binc. presents...Rainbow Blob! A fast-paced action puzzle game where once you start moving in one direction, you can't stop on your own.

Dash through 15 levels and make crafty split-second decisions to collect all of the silver orbs and move onto each next stage. Watch out for flying pickaxes, blue stomp blocks, turrets, spikes, traps,  etc.

If you're getting overwhelmed, you can just sit and watch the mesmerizing colors move and shift within the heart and soul of our main protagonist, the Rainbow Blob. Legend has it that the Rainbow Blob also thinks YOU'RE cute. Have fun!
